message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair and gives us both a good chunk of money.
Let's split the difference a bit more this time, Alice. Time is ticking!
Okay, Bob, let's meet closer to the middle. This offer acknowledges the time pressure and gives us both a decent share.

Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it before inflation eats away any more!
